## What is a Creative Sound Card Driver?
 
A creative sound card driver is a software program that allows your computer to communicate with your creative sound card. A sound card is a device that converts digital audio signals into analog signals that can be played through speakers or headphones. A creative sound card driver ensures that your sound card works properly with your operating system and other applications.
